root.name: Paganitzu
root.description: OverviewPaganitzu is a 2D tile based puzzle game by Apogee Software. The game puts players in the boots of adventurer, Alabama Smith. His mission which he has clearly chosen to accept is to explore an ancient Aztec tomb in search of treasure. Most levels are heavily puzzle based requiring the player to often slide blocks left and right in order to proceed, or trap enemies. The enemies consist mainly of snakes, spiders, and rocks.
